text:
It's still not clear who is running the country. 
Bottom line: who currently has the authority to authorise a nuclear strike? 
Boris Johnson? 
Dominic Raab?
Or someone else? 
And before you say 'that will never happen!' - none of us thought any of this would happen 3 months ago.
